Keywords: Asgardian , Deity , Monster , Ruler
Real Name: Surtur
Special Powers
REALM OF THE GIANTS: MUSPELHEIM: If Surtur is 150 points or more, when an opposing character would reduce damage, they reduce that damage by one less. When Surtur is KO'd, this effect continues for the rest of the game.
MARCH ON ASGARD: FREE: If no characters have been placed this turn, place Surtur adjacent to an opposing character that attacked a friendly character since your last turn.
KING OF THE FIRE GIANTS: STOP. Toughness.
THE SWORD TWILIGHT: When Surtur hits with a close attack, choose a standard defense power or STOP. Hit characters can't use the chosen power or ability until your next turn.

Comments
February 11, 2022
Maxphyte
How is Surtur making two attacks a turn? His retaliation power only places him now. It doesn’t make an attack. I don’t have the card so I can’t tell if something is missing on here.
February 11, 2022
Redrover454
Super good retaliator for only 25pts. No Colossal Indifference and an easy to trigger Retaliation. Shutting off Def powers and STOP with his close attacks means he's great for setting up whoever he hits to be KO'd in a follow up attack from another friendly. Excellent keywords to boot!
